# averageMeasurement

**Instance Property**

The value of the average.

## Declaration

```swift
var averageMeasurement: Measurement<UnitType> { get }
```

## Reading the data

- **sampleCount**: The number of samples used to calculate the average.
- **standardDeviation**: The standard deviation of the distribution of values used to calculate the average.
